name: Pirates of the West
description:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like if pirates roamed the Wild West? This interactive Twine game will show you exactly what it would be like with 100% accuracy according to National Geographic, the Discovery Channel, the History Channel, AND Nicholas Cage. (*not true* *or is it?*)

I'm a writer, not a UX Designer. Please focus on the story (not the design, I tried my best) and truly *become* a Pirate in the West.
